grn.description: The persistent identifier for this dashboard.

name.description: The user-visible name of this dashboard.

description.description: The user-visible description for this dashboard.

type.description: The type of this resource, which in this case should always be "dashboard".

globalFilters.description: Specifies filters that are applied to all dashboard blocks.

dataModel.description: Filepath or GRN of the model definition which contains the column being filtered.

sections.description: Specifies the sections that belong to this dashboard

filters.description: Specifies filters that are applied to blocks in the section.

rows.description: Specifies the rows of blocks that belong to the section.

blocks.description: Specifies the blocks to display in this row.

width.description: Specifies the width of a content block (saved views, metric, or markdown)

text.description: The markdown text content of this block.

width.description: Specifies the width of a content block (saved views, metric, or markdown)

dataModel.description: Filepath or GRN of the model definition which contains this metric.

dataModelMetricId.description: ID of the metric column (in `dataModel`) to display

label.description: Label to display for this block

filters.description: Filters to apply when calculating the metric of this block

ignoreDashboardFilters.description: Flag indicating whether the chart should ignore global & section filters

width.description: Specifies the width of a content block (saved views, metric, or markdown)

savedView.description: Filepath or GRN of the saved view to display.

label.description: Label to display for this block

axisLabels.description: The visibility of axis labels when using an area, bar, or line chart

legendPosition.description: The position of the chart legend when using an area, bar, line, or horizontal bar chart

ignoreDashboardFilters.description: Flag indicating whether the chart should ignore global & section filters

legend.description: Deprecated -- use "legendPosition" instead. This field is ignored.

height.description: Specifies the height of the row.
